casebody.data:
Michael Joseph WASHINGTON
v.
NORTH CAROLINA COURT OF APPEALS. No. 644P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Michael J. Washington, pro se. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 27th day of December 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Lenoir County:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in Conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
